mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_member (project_id, user_id, role, status) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{userId}, #{role}, #{status}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE role = #{role}, status = #{status}, join_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.update: UPDATE project_member SET status = 0 WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT pm.*, u.nickname, u.email, p.project_name FROM project_member pm LEFT JOIN user u ON pm.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN project p ON pm.project_id = p.id WHERE pm.project_id = #{projectId} AND pm.status = 1 ORDER BY pm.role ASC, pm.join_time ASC
